The bedroom is a room of a house, apartment, dormitory, or hotel in which people sleep. A typical western bedroom contains as bedroom furniture one or two beds (ranging from a crib for an infant, a single or twin bed for a toddler, child, teenager, or single adult to bigger sizes like a full, double, queen, king or California king (eastern or waterbed size for a couple) and/or a futon), a clothing storage closet, and bedside table, and a dresser.
